name: Whalley Ball
description:
Best winter sport on the planet!

2 players are controlling an orca and try to create waves so the ball on the platform rolls to the opponents side.

Controls:

Player 1

Movement: A and D

Action: Left Ctrl

Player 2

Movement: Left and Right arrow key

Action Right Ctrl

Esc-button quits the game.

Credits:
